nodes.text: The Kimm systems referred to a trio of star systems located in the Mid Rim, each with a shabby industrial planet of the same name: Kimm Aurek, Kimm Besh, and Kimm Cresh. These three worlds belonged to House Sreethyn of the Juvex sector. The systems produced rip-off agri-droids and shared their name with the epithet "Nemesis of the Kimm," one of the many titles bestowed upon the Jedi Master Sharad Hett by 47 BBY.
